title: Tadej Pogačar Goes all-Pink for Monte Grappa Assault: Giro d’Italia Leader’s Special Colnago V4RS
content:
Italian brand Colnago issued Pogačar a very special V4RS for stage 20 of the Giro d'Italia on Saturday. Here's a look at the custom decals, etched-out saddle, and more.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Goes all-Pink for Monte Grappa Assault: Giro d’Italia Leader’s Special Colnago V4RS on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
